After reinstruction by second audiologist: SAT 25 dB HL, pure-tones ~50 dB HL (inconsistent), BC 35 dB @1kHz. Word recognition poor/absent throughout." }

logic_summary: Updated V1 Pure-tone audiometry result summary to include details of the initial attempt and the subsequent reinstruction results.

patch_ops.value: Left: NR at limits. Right: Initial attempt showed SAT 90 dB HL with severe-to-profound thresholds (poor reliability). After reinstruction by second audiologist: SAT 25 dB HL, pure-tones ~50 dB HL (inconsistent), BC 35 dB @1kHz. Word recognition poor/absent throughout.
